item.title: Tesla Q4 Earnings Beats Wall Street Expectations
item.description: Tesla reported adjusted earnings per share of $0.50, above a Wall Street estimate of $0.44.

item.title: Corning Garners Analyst And Retail Attention After Q4 Results, Meta Deal
item.description: The company reported revenue of $4.41 billion and EPS of $0.72 for the latest quarter, beating market expectations.

item.title: RGNX Shares Pare Losses As Wall Street Dismisses Gene Therapy Clinical Hold Spurred Selloff As An Overreaction
item.description: The company announced earlier on Wednesday that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration placed a clinical hold on its investigational gene therapy, RGX-...

item.title: Powell Says Future Rate Cut Decisions Will Be Made On Meeting By Meeting Basis
item.description: Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell said the Fed has not made any decisions about future meetings and added that the economy is growing at a solid pac...
